ED_Title: 2025 United  Nations Conference to Support the Implementation of Sustainable Development Goal 14: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development
ED_DecisionText: At its 99th plenary meeting, on 1 September 2023, the General Assembly, on the proposal of Costa Rica and France,  (Footnote: A/77/L.104.) recalled its resolution 77/242 of 20 December 2022, in which it had decided to consider, before the end of the seventy-seventh session of the General Assembly, the modalities of the 2025 United Nations Conference to Support the Implementation of Sustainable Development Goal 14: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development in the most efficient and effective manner possible, and decided to extend its consideration until 31 December 2023.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/77/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
